mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.content AS "content", a.important_level AS "importantLevel", a.emergency_level AS "emergencyLevel", a.schedule_date AS "scheduleDate", a.flag AS "flag", a.login_id AS "loginId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_schedule( id, content, important_level, emergency_level, schedule_date, flag, login_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{content}, #{importantLevel}, #{emergencyLevel}, #{scheduleDate}, #{flag}, #{loginId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_schedule SET content = #{content}, important_level = #{importantLevel}, emergency_level = #{emergencyLevel}, schedule_date = #{scheduleDate}, flag = #{flag}, login_id=#{loginId} WHERE id = #{id}
